subject: [Radiance-general] 2008 Radiance Workhop in Fribourg, Switzerland
body:
Dr. Rapha?l Compagnon, the original host of the Radiance Workshop is
hosting the event for the third time at his technical college in
Fribourg, Switzerland:

Dates: October 30 and 31, 2008
Location: Ecole d?ing?nieurs et d?architectes de Fribourg in
Fribourg, Switzerland (see map : http://tinyurl.com/6ruc5z )
Participation fees:
For participants giving a presentation: 240 CHF or 150 EUR
For participants without a presentation 305 CHF or 190 EUR
For students (copy of student card required) with or without a
presentation: 120 CHF or 75 EUR
These fees will cover:
Coffee breaks, lunchs, the official dinner and a voucher for buses
inside the city.

Registration forms and hotel booking information will be available on
a dedicated web page I will prepare by the end of August.

Rob Shakespeare will be our invited guest speaker this year.

If you have any comments or questions, please send them to me and
Rapha?l <Raphael.Compagnon@hefr.ch>.

Hope to see you there!
-Greg
